alert.note: Alert for Brown; Callahan; San Saba; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 30 at 1:46PM CDT until July 30 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures and heat index values near 103 this afternoon will climb to 105 degrees on Monday afternoon. * WHERE...Throckmorton, Shackelford, Callahan, Brown and San Saba Counties. * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, until 8 PM CDT this evening. For the Excessive Heat Warning, from noon to 8 PM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat and humidity will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Callahan; San Saba; Shackelford; Throckmorton
